Metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24659 affecting package gnutls for versions less than 3.6.14-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2020-24659 affecting package gnutls for versions less than 3.6.14-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package gnutls is earlier than 3.6.14-5, affected by CVE-2020-24659
